title: ‘Oz as a high-fashion, elitist society’: how Wicked made musicals chic
description: The high-couture styles of the film version of the hit show reflect a trend of designer daring on the stageMusicals used to be associated with glee club kids more likely to be wearing jazz shoes than anything cutting edge from the catwalks. But with the film version of Wicked – which was released this weekend and was expected to take more than $100m (£80m) at the US box office alone – promoted by global pop star Ariana Grande and actor Cynthia Erivo ­wearing Vivienne Westwood, Schiaparelli and Louis Vuitton, musicals are having a pitch-perfect style moment.Even before it opened, there was a glut of Wicked collaborations across skincare, haircare and hoodies – more than 400 in total, including Gap, Kipling, Crocs, H&M, Claire’s Accessories and Marks & Spencer. Fancy London department store Liberty, with its tasteful Tudor-beamed building, has teamed up with Universal Pictures to make over its windows Wicked-style. Continue reading...
author: Ellie Violet Bramley

title: 242 best Christmas gifts for 2024: perfect present ideas chosen by the experts
description: From Monty Don’s top garden tool to Sali Hughes’s perfect lipstick and Yotam Ottolenghi’s favourite ever present, we asked everyone what they wanted – so you don’t have toStuck for what to buy everyone for Christmas? You won’t be for long … From gifts for fitness fans and gardeners to presents for pets (and their adorable owners), teens and beauty lovers, we’ve got all bases covered.Best of all, they’re hand-picked from the experts themselves: we’ve taken out the guesswork and asked the kids, chefs, cyclists and more to tell us what they actually want this year. Merry Christmas! Continue reading...

title: 26 Gifts For Dogs, Cats, And Their Humans
description: This holiday season, we’ve found the gifts that feel great to get and even better to give. Shop Well-Received, our collection of editor-approved holiday gift guides, here.The best holiday gift for your loved one with a pet is something relating to their pet. You likely already figured this out, as having a pet is a major part of, if not their whole personality. I say this because that’s very much me: My life revolves around two 11-lb. Chihuahuas that I would do anything for, and the gifts I’m most excited to receive are those that are either for them or about them. (Their sweater collection is way better than my own, I must admit.) So, I’ve curated some of the most delightful products on the market right now for the dog owner, cat owner, or simply animal lover on your shopping list.   All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.FP x Maxbone Dog BalaclavaLittle animals can get cold easily, so a sweater is a must. But don’t overlook their heads, either: This balaclava — a collaboration between Maxbone and Free People — will keep their faces warm (and you delighted) all winter long.Shop Free People.FP x Maxbone Dog Balaclava, $, available at Free PeopleDamson Madder Novelty Dog CollarGet ready to be tagged in a lot of pictures, because this precious pet collar is a social media magnet.Shop Damson Madder.Damson Madder Novelty Dog Collar, $, available at Damson MadderDyson Purifier Cool Gen1 TP10 Purifying FanOf all its air purifiers, Dyson recommends its Cool Gen1 TP10 purifying fan for pet owners, with its HEPA and activated carbon to remove both particles and odors. Shop Dyson. Dyson Purifier Cool Gen1 TP10 Purifying Fan, $, available at DysonUrban Outfitters Cat INSTAX Picture Frame VaseThis combination pencil holder-picture frame will hold not just their desk essentials, but also their favorite picture of their beloved cat. Shop Urban Outfitters.Urban Outfitters Cat INSTAX Picture Frame Vase, $, available at Urban OutfittersLittle Beast x Lisa Says Gah Cirque CarrierI have this Little Beast carrier from a past collaboration, but am considering doubling up with the harlequin-print style from its latest drop with Lisa Says Gah. It’s padded all over, so super comfy for the pup and your shoulder; it has tons of pockets to store treats, collapsible water bowls, and whatever else you may need for an outing. The matching poop bag is a nice touch.Shop Little Beast.Little Beast x Lisa Says Gah Cirque Carrier, $, available at Little BeastRalph Lauren Cotton Chino Baseball CapRalph Lauren offers some of the best customization in the fashion space: On most of its core pieces — the polos, the crewnecks, the caps — you can change the logo from the classic pony to a range of dog breeds. Add an extra special touch by monogramming the back with their pet’s name. Shop Ralph Lauren.Ralph Lauren Cotton Chino Baseball Cap, $, available at Ralph LaurenLesure Human Dog BedI can’t think of a single person whose life wouldn’t be improved with the addition of this human-sized dog bed, to cuddle with a pet or not.Shop Amazon.Lesure Human Dog Bed, $, available at AmazonFable Magic LeashThis convertible leash is made from a sturdy (we’re talking industrial-strength) brushed cord that’s waterproof and easy to clean, and can be adjusted to be held around the wrist or across the body for hands-free walks. Shop Fable.Fable Magic Leash®, $, available at FablePet So Good Peanut Cat ScratcherA cat scratcher so chic, it can double as decor? Pet So Good has the cat owner in your life sorted with this sculptural two-in-one board.Shop Free People.Pet So Good Peanut Cat Scratcher, $, available at Free PeopleAnthropologie Pet SweaterPets can embrace the coquette aesthetic, too. The best part of this specific bow-adorned sweater from Anthropologie is that the retailer sells a skirt in the same style (available in sizes XS through 3X and on sale!), so your loved one and their furry loved one can match. A gift that keeps on giving.  Shop Anthropologie.Anthropologie 3D Motif Pet Sweater, $, available at AnthropologieLoewe Corgi Charm“Birkinified” bags — everyday totes personalized with charms, chains, and other accouterments — were huge in 2024, and the trend will continue into the new year. Get your luxury-obsessed loved one a new addition to their growing collection that reflects their love of dogs.    Shop Loewe.Loewe Corgi Charm, $, available at LoeweDusen Dusen Embroidered Dog BedThe pet owner in your life definitely wouldn’t hate a dog bed upgrade (or even a second one to put in a different room) — especially if it boasts a darling print that fits in with their decor, like this one from Dusen Dusen.Shop Nordstrom.Dusen Dusen Embroidered Dog Bed, $, available at NordstromCathaus SpellboundThis patchwork carpet play station will not only entertain their cat, it’ll add a little something special to their space — so it’s a gift for their pet and for them.Shop Etsy.Cathaus Spellbound, $, available at EtsyKate Spade New York Handbag Pet ToyFur baby’s first Sam bag! Shop Kate Spade New York.Kate Spade New York Handbag Pet Toy, $, available at Kate Spade New YorkWoof Bite-n-BrushDental care is very important for dogs. That said, it can be a bit of a hassle. (You try brushing an elderly Chihuahua’s teeth.) Woof’s Bite n’ Brush sneaks in a good toothbrush to your dog’s playtime, thanks to the bristles surrounding the dental treat.  Shop Woof.Woof The Bite n' Brush, $, available at WoofJonathan Adler Meow Vice Pet BowlThe cats in your life deserve only the best — and this Jonathan Adler bowl will elevate every one of their meals. Shop Neiman Marcus.Jonathan Adler Meow Vice Pet Bowl, $, available at Neiman MarcusRachel Antonoff Lillian TurtleneckTo appreciate Rachel Antonoff’s prints, you have to look closely — this may seem like your run-of-the-mill graphic turtleneck, but, upon further inspection, you’ll see how it’s actually a dog-centric riff on Botticelli’s Venus de Milo, starring some truly gorgeous pups.  Shop Rachel Antonoff.Rachel Antonoff Lillian Turtleneck, $, available at Rachel AntonoffJulia Ockert Custom Pet Portrait Oil Pastel ArtworkFor pet owners, the limit on artistic renditions of their loved one they’ll lovingly display in their home does not exist. Trust me on this one. Shop Etsy.JuliaOckert Custom Pet Portrait Oil Pastel Artwork, $, available at EtsySusan Alexandra Pet Bow EarringsGift a piece of Susan Alexandra’s triumphant New York Fashion Week dog show to the animal lover in your life. Shop Susan Alexandra.Susan Alexandra Pet Bow Earrings 4, $, available at Susan AlexandraReformation x Shrimps Dog SweaterReformation’s collaborations are always hits — but its latest one with British brand Shrimps is especially noteworthy, because it included, for the first time, a dog sweater. It’s made with regenerative wool and 95% recycled cashmere, has an incredible oversized collar, and immediately climbed to the top of your fashion-loving dog owner’s wish list.Shop Reformation.Reformation x Shrimps Chip Regenerative Wool Dog Sweater, $, available at ReformationJ.W. Anderson Fleece Hooded JacketJ.W. Anderson’s 2024 collection included a handful of pieces featuring artwork by Katharina Kubrick of a cat named Polly for her father Stanley’s 60th birthday — and it’ll work just as well as a holiday gift for your cat lover.Shop J.W. Anderson.J.W. Anderson Fleece Hooded Jacket, $, available at J.W. AndersonStaud Custom Alec BagA portrait of their #1 good boy/girl on their new favorite everyday handbag? Perfection. Shop Staud.Staud Custom Alec Bag, $, available at StaudMarc Jacobs Cats Out Of The Bag NecklaceA more subtle expression of cat love, this Marc Jacobs necklace features a charm of the brand’s signature tote with a kitten peeking out. Cute!Shop Ssense.Marc Jacobs Silver Cats Out Of The Bag Necklace, $, available at SSENSECozystar Blanket HoodieI’ve been served this as an Instagram ad countless times, and have dropped some not-so-subtle hints to my loved ones that I would really, really love this oversized blanket hoodie with a spacious front pouch that a pet can snuggle into. What’s not to love?Shop Amazon.Cozystar Wearable Blanket Hoodie with Giant Pocket, $, available at AmazonCleverpup Bistro Box Dog Food Travel KitTechnically, this is designed with dogs in mind, but it’s a useful bundle for anyone traveling with pets — a convenient way to store and carry all their food, as well as everything they might need to dine on the road. Shop Cleverpup.Cleverpup Bistro Box Dog Food Travel Kit, $, available at CleverpupThom Browne Holiday Hector Card HolderHector Browne-Bolton is one of fashion’s most famous, beloved pets — so famous and beloved, he’s become a recurring motif in his dad Thom Browne’s brand. This cardholder checks off all the boxes: useful, timeless, and darling.Shop Thom Browne.Thom Browne Holiday Hector Card Holder, $, available at Thom BrowneHaute Diggity Dog Snuggly CupIf you love your Stanley, it’s only fair your furry best friend gets one, too.Shop Amazon.Haute Diggity Dog Snuggly Cup, $, available at AmazonLike what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?We Found 12 Crowd-Pleasing Gifts On Sale NowThe 26 Best Fashion Gifts For Every BudgetWe Found You The Best Luxury Gifts Under $100
author: Ana Colon

title: 25 Winter Wedding Guest Outfits, From Sequined Dresses To Printed Pantsuits
description: If you haven’t already, it’s time to start planning your winter wedding guest outfits. Whether you’re looking for a new party dress or are partial to formal pants, we’re here to help you get the ball rolling on your search for what to wear to this season's nuptials. These festivities are a chance to play around with seasonal colors and dazzling fabrics, which can then be worn during the holidays — think festive velvet dresses and long-sleeve jumpsuits for more formal affairs, or sequin numbers that embody that end-of-year vibe.We’ve rounded up 25 winter wedding guest outfit ideas for every dress code, budget, and personal style. Ahead, find the best winter dresses, jumpsuits, and pantsuits from reader-favorite retailers like Free People, Reformation, Zara, and more that’ll get you on the best-dressed list.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Black-tie Wedding Guest DressesFormal winter weddings likely require black-tie dresses, which should probably be floor-length but certainly don’t have to be black. For the colder months, look out for long-sleeve gowns in luxe velvets or weightier sequins in rich jewel tones. Then throw on a faux fur shawl, slip into comfortable heels, and swipe on burgundy lipstick to complete your ensemble.Shop Ralph LaurenRalph Lauren Velvet Scoopneck Tank Dress, $, available at Ralph LaurenClub L London Satin Feather Trim Maxi DressShop Club L LondonClub L London Satin Feather Trim Maxi Dress, $, available at Club L LondonEloquii Paillette Sequin Maxi DressShop EloquiiEloquii Paillette Sequin Maxi Dress, $, available at EloquiiMichael Costello x Revolve Loren GownShop RevolveMichael Costello x revolve Loren Gown, $, available at RevolveShow Me Your Mumu Greta DressShop Show Me Your MumuShow Me Your Mumu Greta Dress, $, available at Show Me Your MumuCocktail Wedding Guest DressesCocktail attire is one of the most popular special-occasion dress codes, offering a balance between formal and casual, and allowing you (and the party) to move from day to night. It also opens you up to more silhouettes, hemline lengths, and fabrics. For the winter, we recommend midi dresses with delicate lace and mesh trims or elevated pearl embellishments. Shop ReformationReformation Plus Stasia Silk Dress, $, available at ReformationBardot Liyana Ruched Mesh DressShop RevolveBardot Liyana Ruched Mesh Dress, $, available at RevolveCorey Lynn Calter Valentina Sleeveless Midi DressShop AnthropologieCorey Lynn Calter Valentina Sleeveless Midi Dress, $, available at AnthropologieNever Fully Dressed Sequin Jem DressShop Never Fully DressedNever Fully Dressed Sequin Jem Dress, $, available at Never Fully DressedLulus Mesh Pearl One-Shoulder Midi DressShop LulusLulus Mesh Pearl One-Shoulder Midi Dress, $, available at LulusCasual Wedding Guest DressesFor winter weddings with outdoor ceremonies or restaurant receptions with casual, cozy vibes, keep your comfort (and warmth) top of mind. Slip into long-sleeve mini or midi dresses, and pair them with sheer black tights and a pair of booties or closed-toe pumps. (You also can’t go wrong with a velvet maxi.) And don’t be afraid of prints — play with festive plaids and winter florals.Shop Free PeopleFree People Nightingale Plaid Midi Dress, $, available at Free PeoplePetal & Pup Ginnee Puff Sleeve Cutout Midi DressShop Petal & PupPetal & Pup Ginnee Puff Sleeve Cutout Midi Dress, $, available at Petal & PupGood American Velvet Fit For Success Maxi DressShop Good AmericanGood American Velvet Fit For Success Maxi Dress, $, available at Good AmericanSelkie The London DressShop RevolveSelkie The London Dress, $, available at RevolveMadewell V-Neck Cuff-Sleeve Maxi DressShop MadewellMadewell V-Neck Cuff-Sleeve Maxi Dress, $, available at MadewellWedding Guest JumpsuitsWe love the idea of a jumpsuit for a winter wedding, because, let’s be honest: We don’t really want our legs exposed to the frigid winter air. To stay warm and comfortable while looking stylish, seek out long-sleeved, high-neck silhouettes in rich velvets and luxe jersey knits. Keep it sleek in black, or test out trendy burgundy, navy blue, or metallic silver styles.Shop City ChicCity Chic Plus Lana Jumpsuit, $, available at City ChicAbercrombie & Fitch Contrast Strapless JumpsuitShop Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch Contrast Strapless Jumpsuit, $, available at Abercrombie & FitchTopshop Midi Jacquard Jumpsuit With LaceShop AsosTopshop Midi Jacquard Jumpsuit With Lace, $, available at ASOSBar III Plus Size Metallic Jersey One-Shoulder JumpsuitShop Macy’sBar III Plus Size Metallic Jersey One-Shoulder Jumpsuit, $, available at Macy'sRamy Brook Gabriel Velvet Plunging JumpsuitShop Ramy BrookRamy Brook Gabriel Velvet Plunging Jumpsuit, $, available at Ramy BrookWedding Guest Pant SuitsThese days, pantsuits for wedding guests are more chic than ever before, so we want to put these matching separates on your radar. Be playful with metallic, floral, or velvet suits that can be worn on their own with a statement necklace, or with a blouse or vest underneath. When the party’s over, rewear the blazers and trousers for winter festivities and office days alike. Shop ZaraZara Wrinkle Look Sparkle Blazer, $, available at ZaraZara Wrinkled Effect Shiny Pants, $, available at ZaraAnn Taylor The Greenwich Blazer & Perfect Wide-Leg PantShop Ann TaylorAnn Taylor The Greenwich Blazer, $, available at Ann TaylorAnn Taylor The Perfect Wide-Leg Pant, $, available at Ann TaylorFarm Rio Night Jungle Blazer & Night Jungle Flare PantsShop Farm RioFarm Rio Navy Blue Night Jungle Blazer, $, available at Farm RioFarm Rio Navy Blue Night Jungle Flare Pants, $, available at Farm RioMango Cropped Velvet Vest & Velvet Wideleg PantsShop MangoMango Cropped Velvet Vest, $, available at MangoMango Velvet Wideleg Pants, $, available at MangoWildfang Empower Tux Blazer & Empower Trouser PantShop Urban OutfittersWildfang Empower Tux Blazer, $, available at Urban OutfittersWildfang Empower Trouser Pant, $, available at Urban OutfittersBlack-tie Wedding Guest DressesYour upcoming formal winter weddings will likely require black-tie dress, which should probably be floor-length but certainly doesn’t have to be black. For the colder months, look out for long-sleeve gowns in luxe velvets or weightier sequins in rich jewel tones. Once you find your perfect dress, throw on a faux fur shawl, slip into comfortable heels, and swipe on burgundy lipstick to complete your ensemble.Shop RixoRIXO Emory Embroidered Velvet Gown, $, available at RixoAtsu Crystal-Embellished Bow Mini DressShop AnthropologieAtsu Crystal-Embellished Bow Mini Dress, $, available at AnthropologieCasual Wedding Guest DressesFor winter weddings with outdoor ceremonies and cocktail hours or with more casual, cozy vibes, keep your comfort (and warmth) top of mind. Slip into long-sleeve mini and midi dresses with matching scarves or velvet maxis, and pair them with sheer black tights and a pair of booties or closed-toe pumps.Shop Free PeopleNigel Preston Velvet Maxi Dress, $, available at Free PeopleGood American Velvet Blazer Mini DressShop Good AmericanGood American Velvet Blazer Mini Dress, $, available at Good AmericanPomander Place Green Jacquard Samantha DressShop TuckernuckPomander Place Green Jacquard Samantha Dress, $, available at TuckernuckPetal & Pup Francesca Floral Midi Dress & ScarfShop Petal & PupPetal & Pup Francesca Floral Midi Dress & Scarf, $, available at Petal & PupAbercrombie & Fitch High-Neck Draped JumpsuitShop Abercrombie & FitchSkims High-Neck Draped Jumpsuit, $, available at SkimsAnn Taylor Belted Shawl-Collar Blazer & Straight Leg PantShop Ann TaylorAnn Taylor The Belted Shawl-Collar Blazer in Fluid Crepe, $, available at Ann TaylorAnn Taylor The Straight Leg Pant in Fluid Crepe, $, available at Ann TaylorLike what you see? title: The Best Early Black Friday Fashion Deals, According to a Shopping Expert
description: Is there anything better than finding (read: falling in love with) a new handbag or trendy pair of sneakers, then discovering that the same product is also on sale at a fraction of its usual cost? Even after years of working as a shopping editor, I know firsthand that the "stars aligned" feeling of finding a dream style at the right price never really goes away - especially come Black Friday, when the season's most coveted wardrobe essentials are often marked down at their lowest prices of the year. While 2024's biggest shopping day is still a few days away, many retailers are getting in the holiday spirit early, with Black Friday sales that span the entire month of November and encompass a range of products. J.Crew is offering up to 50 percent off styles sitewide, including cozy sweaters and cardigans. Forever 21's early Black Friday sale is live, where shoppers can take 30 percent off trendy fashion staples - like faux-leather coats and evening bags. And even Amazon unveiled a bevy of new fashion markdowns on its bestselling clothing - including editor-loved bodysuits and Levi's jeans. Regardless of what you're in the market for, you can save big on it right now. Keep reading to shop our picks for the best early Black Friday fashion deals. Looking for something specific? Jump to our specific categories below: Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bestsellers Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Tops and Sweaters Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bottoms Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Dresses Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Winter Jackets Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Shoes Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Accessories Looking for even more sales? Shop more of PS's Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals, and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations. Update on November 26, 2024 at 10:30 a.m.: Updated prices and checked stock for all products.
author: Kyley Warren

title: 12 Abercrombie Jeans TikTok Is Obsessed With Right Now
description: You can never have enough pairs of comfortable and stylish jeans, and as shopping editors, we're always on the hunt for the best ones. TikTok has been obsessed with Abercrombie's assortment of jeans for quite some time. In fact, the brand gained a whole new crop of fans and admirers after they spotted the brand's Curve Love straight jeans on Francia Raísa's character in "How I Met Your Father." Even our editors are fans of the brand's wardrobe essentials and the new NFL collection, both of which pair beautifully with the brand's denim lineup. If you want to try these fan-favorite jeans for yourself, we curated some of the top styles you need in your closet. Standout denim styles include the editor-backed '90s straight jeans and mom jeans. The Curve Love collection is also on sale and it has an additional two inches at the hips and thighs, giving you a comfortable yet figure-flattering look that hugs your curves in all the right places. Each pair comes in a variety of washes and designs, too. Whether you're in the market for a crisscross waistband or a distressed look, the list ahead includes all the latest denim trends. These styles also accommodate height with length options ranging from extra short to long. Ahead, you can shop our favorite denim shorts and timeless jeans from Abercrombie. Some washes and styles are on sale too, so stock up while you can!
author: Anvita Reddy
